entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
